text: A list of Romanian Orthodox monasteries, predominantly located in present-day Romania. ==Argeș County== *Curtea de Argeș Monastery * *Negru Vodă Monastery *Trivale Monastery ==Bucharest== *Antim Monastery *Cașin Monastery *Christiana Monastery *Mihai Vodă Monastery *Radu Vodă Monastery *Stavropoleos Monastery * ==Dâmbovița County== * Bâldana Monastery * Bunea Monastery * Cobia Monastery * Dealu Monastery * Doicești Monastery * Nucet Monastery * Pătroaia Deal Monastery * Peștera Ialomicioarei Monastery * Săcuieni Monastery * Stelea Monastery * Viforâta Monastery ==Ilfov County== *Căldăruşani Monastery *Cernica Monastery *Pasărea Monastery *Sămurcășești Monastery *Sitaru Monastery *Snagov Monastery ==Neamț County== *Agapia Monastery *Văratec Monastery *Neamț Monastery ==Suceava County== *Bogdana Monastery *Dragomirna *Humor Monastery *Moldovița Monastery *Putna Monastery *Sucevița Monastery *Voroneț Monastery ==Unsorted== Bârsana Monastery, northern Romania.
